data.eml:eml: Revision of the subgenus Dicranomyia (Erostrata) Savchenko, 1976 (Diptera, Limoniidae) of Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kato, Daichi, Tachi, Takuji, Gelhaus, Jon (2018): Revision of the subgenus Dicranomyia (Erostrata) Savchenko, 1976 (Diptera, Limoniidae) of Japan. Zootaxa 4441 (1): 181-194, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4441.1.11
